General.Name: Meidensha Corporation
General.Description: Meidensha Corporation engages in the power infrastructure; public, industrial, and commercial sector; mobility and electrical components; field service engineering; and real estate businesses in Japan and internationally. The company provides vacuum circuit breaker and interrupter; high-voltage switchgear; transformer; mobile station; zinc oxide blocks; surge arresters; turbine and engine generators; biomass power generation system; and photovoltaic and hydroelectric power systems. It offers AC and DC power feeding system for railways; regenerative power recovery system; overhead catenary system and inspection system; high precision static overhead catenary system; pantograph monitoring system; power control systems; and wireless remote monitoring systems. In addition, the company provides power transmission and distribution systems; power generating systems; monitoring and control systems; cloud computing services for water suppliers and sewage treatment operators; membrane filtration system for drinking water treatment plant; automated water supply control and water distribution control support system; sewerage treatment process simulator; water quality measurement equipment; industrial wastewater treatment systems; and contract facility management services for water utility. Further, it offers ICT solution; cloud service for facility maintenance; cloud computing services; motor and drive systems; semiconductor manufacturing equipment; communication systems; automotive testing systems; electric vehicle drive systems; industrial logistics systems; construction works; and maintenance services. Meidensha Corporation was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4.Name: Mr. Norio  Takekawa
4.Title: Exec. VP, Representative Director & Exec. Officer
